title: (Client) Star Guardians Quiz | League of Legends

embed.description: They are protectors blazing bright, yet destined to collapse as furiously as they burn. They are the Star Guardians.

body:
[CLIENT]
So when the star guardians quiz was on the front page of my league client, i clicked on it and did the star guardians quiz. I took the quiz and got a result of "You are star guardian jinx!" The quiz said the generic: "Congratulations! You got a star guardians icon!" after I completed it. The end screen also said that it would take up to three days for the icon to arrive, however its been longer than three days, and I haven't received an icon.
To get this bug I went through the quiz with these answers in this order:
Freedom, True light never fades, Nothing, Your Beloved sleeping under a willow, I reach out and swing at it, As nobody, Soar, I move on, With those I love, Hide it, Peace, Enchanting, To-do Lists.
The quiz will then say "Congratulations! You are Star Guardian Jinx!" and tell you you will get a star guardians icon. (Hate to crush your dreams kiddo, but you won't)
I've taken the quiz a couple more times since that first attempt just in case, but no luck. 
 p.s. Dear forum mods, if this is an issue for technical support rather than the bug forums I'll be happy to move there.
Edit: I'm looking on the forums and I've seen some other people say that they didn't get their icon.
Thanks!
Seth

replies.body:
Hey! 

Originally, we had stated that it was 2-3 days, but with the overwhelming amount of summoners who wanted to know which Star Guardian they were, it may take up to a week for the icon to be added to your account. The icon should find its way to you soon. ^-^
Just got my icon, thanks for all the support guys! :D
Hm hope that's true. I still would like this issue to be solved/public knowledge.

It can take up to a week for the icon to added, so just hang tight.

[Source](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/fRuOekr3-the-star-guardian-quiz?comment=0001).
shit eh alright thx for the note
I too have been having the same problem and its going on to the 4th day now around 7 tomorrow will be day 5
